message: So mine would be EXT21: HTML5 for Skeptics
Just setting this group up for MIX. Tell your fellow attendees that this is a great spot to track sessions. Just create a new topic for each session using the schema CODE: TITLE
Other than that, just have fun.
Jeff, it's Thursday at noon. Not the last session and not the worst session (that's Thursday morning, the one after the attendee party!)
Use this link to share over twitter: http://bit.ly/mix11-convore
Monday a.m., we'll start tweeting this out. Ideally, we have 1 topic per session/bootcamp. I think it'll start to get used more after the Tuesday keynote.
I just created the topics for the Bootcamps for today, Monday April 11
So instead, we'll just do lazy-loading. First one in, create the topic room for your session. Just give it a name < 30 characters so we can see it on the left. Prefix with the session code.
Create your own topic rooms. If they get stale or empty, we'll just delete them.
Hmm. If we have a 1:1 correlation between topic rooms and sessions, this is going to get overwhelming. I don't think the information architecture of this site can handle that.
Chris, nice find on VIM for carnvore. Are you watching the keynote? Moving to Keynote (Wed) channel
